item.title: Salaud Morisset Boards ‘Silent Rebellion’ Ahead of Venice World Premiere, Debuts First Clip (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: International sales agent Salaud Morisset has acquired world rights to “Silent Rebellion” (À bras-le-corps), the debut feature from Swiss director Marie-Elsa Sgualdo. The film is set to have its world
